name: War of the Pants
description:
!!!VR ONLY!!!

You play as an alien of the species known as the Nogi.
You have to harvest pants to clothe the others of your kind with the use of your ship.

CONTROLS
-Move with the stick of the left hand controller -Turn view with the stick of the right hand controller -Grip with the grip button on each controller -Fire your weapons by pressing the trigger buttons -Duck with the secondary button on the right hand controller
-Reset height with the primary button on the left hand controller

SHIP CONTROLS
-Move and turn with the center stick -Control the height with the left stick -Deploy your weapons with the right stick
-Honk the horn by pushing the ball on the right
